article_title: Idaho’s compliance with federal air travel rules in holding pattern
article_text:
Bill to lift compliance ban moves forward, but committee seeks amendments to limit scope

State’s cost, privacy concerns addressed

article_metadata.news-keywords: Idaho legislature, REAL ID, Joe Palmer, Sage Dixon
article_metadata.description: Idaho is moving to lift the ban on complying with federal ID requirements to fly on planes and enter federal facilities, but lawmakers are still wary. A House panel Monday asked for changes to clarify exactly what part of the ban they want to ease.
article_metadata.title: Idaho’s compliance with federal air travel rules in holding pattern | Idaho Statesman
